item.title: Sam Altman says he’s ‘0%’ excited to be CEO of a public company as OpenAI drops hints about an IPO: ‘In some ways I think it’d be really annoying’

item.title: Steve Jobs sold his Volkswagen to raise $1,300 for Apple’s first computer. He became a millionaire just two years later at 23

item.title: AI whiz Yann LeCun is already targeting a $3.5 billion valuation for his new startup—and it hasn’t even launched yet
item.description: The legendary AI researcher announced his departure from Meta, Mark Zuckerberg’s social media empire, just one month ago.

item.title: Exclusive: Cursor acquires code review startup Graphite as AI coding competition heats up
item.description: The deal gives Cursor, currently valued at $29 billion, more code review and debugging capabilities.
